full_summary:
**Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support (ACLS) Training** **Notice Title:** Formation sur les soins avancés en réanimation cardiovasculaire (SARC)
[English] Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support (ACLS) Training **Reference Number:** cb-732-51825798 **Tender Information:** We are inviting qualified bidders to provide Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support (ACLS) training services. The services will be delivered to the First Nations & Inuit Health Branch (FNIHB) of Indigenous Services Canada. **Training Requirements:** The contractor will supply and deliver ACLS training course and materials to registered nurses of FNIHB working in northern nursing stations or hospitals. The training will focus on cardiovascular and/or cardiopulmonary treatment of patients in remote or isolated communities. **Contract Period:** The contract duration will be from the date of award to March 31, 2027. The contract may be extended for up to two (2) additional one-year periods under the same conditions. **Important Dates:** * Tender closing date: May 28, 2024, at 14:00:00 hours * Amendment date: May 28, 2024 **Contract Specification:** * UNSPSC Codes: 86100000, 86101605, 86101706, 86101810 * Classification: Vocational training, Medical vocational training services, Health assistance vocational training services, Labour skills training **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and others (check catalogs) **Selection Criteria:** The selection criteria will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. **Point of Contact:** * Name: Sumanvir Sahota-Chhokar * Email: [sumanvir.sahota-chhokar@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:sumanvir.sahota-chhokar@sac-isc.gc.ca) * Phone: (204) 914-6481 * Address: 391 YORK AVE, Winnipeg, MB, R3C 4W1 **Attachments:** Please download the official notice (ENG) [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36328/solicitation-no
